external_references.description: Shilko, J., et al. (2021, October 7). FIN12: The Prolific Ransomware Intrusion Threat Actor That Has Aggressively Pursued Healthcare Targets. Retrieved June 15, 2023.

description: [Wizard Spider](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0102) has used `cmd.exe` to execute commands on a victim's machine.(Citation: DFIR Ryuk's Return October 2020)(Citation: Mandiant FIN12 Oct 2021)
